commot.pl.plot_cell_communicationÔÉÅ

commot.pl.plot_cell_communication(adata, database_name=None, pathway_name=None, lr_pair=None, keys=None, plot_method='cell', background='summary', background_legend=False, clustering=None, summary='sender', cmap='coolwarm', cluster_cmap=None, pos_idx=array([0, 1]), top_k=5, interp_k=5, ndsize=1, scale=1.0, normalize_v=False, normalize_v_quantile=0.95, arrow_color='#333333', grid_density=1.0, grid_knn=None, grid_scale=1.0, grid_thresh=1.0, grid_width=0.005, stream_density=1.0, stream_linewidth=1, stream_cutoff_perc=5, filename=None, ax=None)ÔÉÅ

Plot cell-cell communication in space.

Parameters

  • adata (AnnData) ‚Äì The data matrix of shape n_obs √ó n_var. Rows correspond to cells or positions and columns to genes.

  • pathway_name (Optional[str]) ‚Äì Name of the signaling pathway.

  • lr_pair ‚Äì A tuple of ligand name and receptor name. If None, the total communication of the pathway will be plotted.

  • keys ‚Äì A list of keys for the vector field as tuples (pathway_name, ligand, receptor). If given, pathway_name and lr_pair will be ignored. If more than one is given, the average will be plotted.

  • plot_method (str) ‚Äì ‚Äòcell‚Äô plot vectors on individual cells. ‚Äògrid‚Äô plot interpolated vectors on regular grids. ‚Äòstream‚Äô streamline plot.

  • background (str) ‚Äì ‚Äòsummary‚Äô scatter plot with color representing total sent or received signal. ‚Äòimage‚Äô the image in Visium data. ‚Äòcluster‚Äô scatter plot with color representing cell clusters.

  • summary (str) ‚Äì ‚Äòsender‚Äô node color represents sender weight. ‚Äòreceiver‚Äô node color represents receiver weight.

  • cmap (str) ‚Äì matplotlib colormap name for node summary if numerical. plotly colormap name for node color if summary is ‚Äòcluster‚Äô

  • pos_idx (ndarray) ‚Äì The coordinates to use for plotting (2D plot).

  • top_k (int) ‚Äì
